clip-path.name: clip-path
clip-path.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements excluding the <defs> element and all graphics elements
clip-path.computedValue: as specified, but with <url> values made absolute

mask-image.name: mask-image
mask-image.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements excluding the <defs> element and all graphics elements
mask-image.computedValue: as specified, but with URIs made absolute

mask-mode.name: mask-mode
mask-mode.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements excluding the <defs> element and all graphics elements

mask-repeat.name: mask-repeat
mask-repeat.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements excluding the <defs> element and all graphics elements
mask-repeat.computedValue: Consists of: two keywords, one per dimension

mask-position.name: mask-position
mask-position.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements excluding the <defs> element and all graphics elements
mask-position.computedValue: Consisting of: two keywords representing the origin and two offsets from that origin, each given as an absolute length (if given a <length>), otherwise as a percentage.
mask-position.percentages: refer to size of mask painting area minus size of mask layer image; see text background-position [CSS3BG]
mask-position.animatable: as repeatable list of simple list of length, percentage, or calc

mask-clip.name: mask-clip
mask-clip.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements excluding the <defs> element and all graphics elements

mask-origin.name: mask-origin
mask-origin.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements excluding the <defs> element and all graphics elements

mask-size.name: mask-size
mask-size.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements excluding the <defs> element and all graphics elements
mask-size.computedValue: as specified, but with lengths made absolute
mask-size.animatable: as repeatable list of simple list of length, percentage, or calc (This means keyword values are not animatable.)

mask-composite.name: mask-composite
mask-composite.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements without the <defs> element and all graphics elements

mask.name: mask
mask.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements excluding the <defs> element and all graphics elements

mask-border-source.name: mask-border-source
mask-border-source.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements excluding the <defs> element and all graphics elements
mask-border-source.computedValue: none or the image with its URI made absolute

mask-border-mode.name: mask-border-mode
mask-border-mode.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements excluding the <defs> element and all graphics elements

mask-border-slice.name: mask-border-slice
mask-border-slice.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements excluding the <defs> element and all graphics elements
mask-border-slice.percentages: refer to size of the mask border image

mask-border-width.name: mask-border-width
mask-border-width.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements excluding the <defs> element and all graphics elements
mask-border-width.computedValue: all <length>s made absolute, otherwise as specified
mask-border-width.percentages: relative to width/height of the mask border image area

mask-border-outset.name: mask-border-outset
mask-border-outset.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements excluding the <defs> element and all graphics elements
mask-border-outset.computedValue: all <length>s made absolute, otherwise as specified

mask-border-repeat.name: mask-border-repeat
mask-border-repeat.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements excluding the <defs> element and all graphics elements

clip.name: clip
clip.appliesTo: Absolutely positioned elements. In SVG, it applies to elements which establish a new viewport, <pattern> elements and mask elements.

<url>.prose: A URL reference to a mask element (for example url(commonmasks.svg#mask)) or to a CSS image.
